医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
加拿大专家敦促谨慎对待免费基因检测和数据共享作者在 CMAJ（加拿大医学协会杂志）上指出，由行业部分或全部补贴提供的免费基因检测可能需要权衡，加拿大的卫生系统必须仔细权衡潜在的临床、伦理和法律考虑因素，以保护患者数据。评论https://www.cmaj.ca/lookup/doi/10.1503/cmaj.231588。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Canadian-experts-urge-caution-on-free-genic-testing-and-data-sharing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Canadian-experts-urge-caution-on-free-genic-testing-and-data-sharing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f48a5a73-61f2-492f-acb0-68ca8ea623ae Mon, 29 Jul 2024 01:56:04 -0400 Canadian experts urge caution on free genetic testing and data sharing
加拿大肥胖症增加是妊娠期高血压增加的原因根据 CMAJ（加拿大医学会杂志）https://www.CMAJ（加拿大医学会杂志）上发表的新研究，在加拿大，妊娠期高血压疾病 (HDP) 的发病率有所上升，但好消息是一些相关的健康状况有所下降。 cmaj.ca/lookup/doi/10.1503/cmaj.231547。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Rising-obesity-blamed-for-increased-pregnancy-hypertension-in-Canada.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Rising-obesity-blamed-for-increased-pregnancy-hypertension-in-Canada.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e1833ee-b7c3-437e-ab1e-e44647283455 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 01:43:09 -0400 Rising obesity blamed for increased pregnancy hypertension in Canada
研究人员开发了预测心脏骤停后神经系统结果的工具大阪都立大学 在治疗心脏骤停时，迅速采取行动可能意味着生与死的区别。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Researchers-develop-tool-to-predict-neurological-outcomes-after-cardiac-arrest.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Researchers-develop-tool-to-predict-neurological-outcomes-after-cardiac-arrest.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b97ebfb5-4e62-45c5-abeb-347ebc5fb384 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 01:37:30 -0400 Researchers develop tool to predict neurological outcomes after cardiac arrest
基于 GLP-1 的多效激动剂：减肥手术的一种有前途的减肥替代方案研究人员强调，基于 GLP-1 的多受体药物在实现大幅减肥和改善健康结果方面取得了前所未有的成功，有可能取代减肥手术来治疗肥胖症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/GLP-1-based-polyagonists-A-promising-weight-loss-alternative-to-bariatric-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/GLP-1-based-polyagonists-A-promising-weight-loss-alternative-to-bariatric-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5e65a43-3aa8-40d5-a5a4-1d47806a433b Sun, 28 Jul 2024 23:51:00 -0400 GLP-1-based polyagonists: A promising weight loss alternative to bariatric surgery
饮食如何影响新陈代谢和肠道微生物群在最近的一篇综述中，研究人员探索了分子营养学的进展，重点关注能量平衡的药物和饮食干预及其与肠道微生物组的相互作用。他们还讨论了新兴的饮食模式以及微生物组研究对营养的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/How-diet-affects-metabolism-and-the-gut-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/How-diet-affects-metabolism-and-the-gut-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2af76fb5-56a8-4db1-a705-04f8a99577fd Sun, 28 Jul 2024 23:23:00 -0400 How diet affects metabolism and the gut microbiome
Insilico Medicine 推出 Science42:DORA 以简化学术写作和研究撰写研究论文对于传播科学发现至关重要，但它确实会带来效率负担，特别是对于早期职业研究人员和非英语母语者而言。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/Insilico-Medicine-unveils-Science42DORA-to-streamline-academic-writing-and-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/Insilico-Medicine-unveils-Science42DORA-to-streamline-academic-writing-and-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1062506d-c7ad-4bf1-9531-4ee2c009db55 Sun, 28 Jul 2024 23:10:20 -0400 Insilico Medicine unveils Science42:DORA to streamline academic writing and research
第一个国际共识统一禁食术语以促进全球研究研究通过德尔菲法建立了第一个关于禁食术语的国际共识，该过程中有 38 名专家参与。这项工作标准化了禁食定义，以加强全球研究和临床实践。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/First-international-consensus-unizes-fasting-terminology-to-boost-global-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/First-international-consensus-unizes-fasting-terminology-to-boost-global-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0d68401-e476-4106-94f8-039b7b677adb Sun, 28 Jul 2024 23:05:00 -0400 First international consensus unifies fasting terminology to boost global research
八周纯素饮食与同卵双胞胎的表观遗传年龄降低有关坚持八周的纯素饮食与基于 DNA 甲基化水平的生物年龄估计值的降低有关； DNA 的一种化学修饰（称为表观遗传修饰），它改变基因表达，但不改变 DNA 本身。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/Eight-week-vegan-diet-linked-to-epigenic-age-reduction-in-identical-twins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/Eight-week-vegan-diet-linked-to-epigenic-age-reduction-in-identical-twins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0364f142-c523-4462-9159-68d5b4454e72 Sun, 28 Jul 2024 23:04:44 -0400 Eight-week vegan diet linked to epigenetic age reduction in identical twins
循证信息对女性抗苗勒氏管激素检测决定的影响澳大利亚的研究人员发现，当女性获得有关卵巢卵子数量的测试的准确信息时，与查看在线信息的女性相比，她们对参加测试的兴趣较小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/Impact-of-evidence-based-information-on-womens-decisions-about-anti-Mullerian-hormone-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/Impact-of-evidence-based-information-on-womens-decisions-about-anti-Mullerian-hormone-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a7df271-3bf6-4971-ae6e-af89eb88ebc4 Sun, 28 Jul 2024 22:58:58 -0400 Impact of evidence-based information on women's decisions about anti-Mullerian hormone testing
新型两性离子聚离子可在肌肉细胞中有效传递质粒 DNA东京都立大学的研究人员创造了一种新的药物输送分子，这是一种两性离子聚合物复合物，当注射到骨骼肌中时，它可以帮助将质粒 DNA 输送到细胞内，这是治疗性 RNA 和蛋白质表达的关键步骤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/New-zwitterionic-polyion-development-for- effective-plasmid-DNA-delivery-in-muscle-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/New-zwitterionic-polyion-development-for- effective-plasmid-DNA-delivery-in-muscle-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11311092-5f8c-48c0-aa33-b43a6d3057b2 Sun, 28 Jul 2024 22:50:35 -0400 New zwitterionic polyion developed for effective plasmid DNA delivery in muscle cells
